text: William George Ashmole (1892 – 1968) was an English footballer who played as a Winger for Burton United, Stockport County, and Watford. ==Playing career== Ashmole played for Burton United and Stockport County. During World War I he played as a guest for West Ham United, Watford, and Port Vale.
